subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Eric Young Jr., who led the N.L. in steals last year, could be the Mets’ leadoff hitter, but he will have to get the nod in center over Juan Lagares, a superior defender.
snippet: Eric Young Jr., who led the N.L. in steals last year, could be the Mets’ leadoff hitter, but he will have to get the nod in center over Juan Lagares, a superior defender.
